        label = "\nClick and type here\n\nFlip for settings",
        input_function = "editDesc", 
        function_owner = self, 
        alignment = f_align,
        position = {0,0.05,0.28}, 
        width = 1800, 
        height = 1000, 
        font_size = 120, 
        scale={x=1, y=1, z=1},
        font_color=f_color,
        color = {0,0,0,0},
        tooltip = ttText
        })

    self.createButton({
        label="- Notecard Settings -",
        tooltip="- Notecard Settings -",
        click_function="null",
        function_owner=self,
        position={0,-0.05,-1.1},
        rotation={180,180,0},
        height=300,
        width=800,
        scale={x=1, y=1, z=1},
        font_size=140,
        font_color=s_color,
        color={0,0,0,0}
        })

    if light_mode then
        lightButtonText = "[ Set dark text ]"
    else
        lightButtonText = "[ Set light text ]"
    end
    self.createButton({
        label=lightButtonText,
        tooltip=lightButtonText,
        click_function="swap_fcolor",
        function_owner=self,
        position={0,-0.05,-0.5},
        rotation={180,180,0},
        height=250,
        width=800,
        scale={x=1, y=1, z=1},
        font_size=100,
        font_color=s_color,
        color={0,0,0,0}
        })

    if center_mode then
        centerButtonText = "[ Set left align ]"
    else
        centerButtonText = "[ Set center align ]"
    end
    self.createButton({
        label=centerButtonText,
        tooltip=centerButtonText,
        click_function="swap_align",
        function_owner=self,
        position={0,-0.05,0},
        rotation={180,180,0},
        height=250,
        width=800,
        scale={x=1, y=1, z=1},
        font_size=100,
        font_color=s_color,
        color={0,0,0,0}
        })

    if tooltip_show then
        tooltipShowText = "[ Hide description in tooltip ]"
    else
        tooltipShowText = "[ Show description in tooltip ]"
    end
    self.createButton({
        label=tooltipShowText,
        tooltip=tooltipShowText,
        click_function="swap_tooltip",
        function_owner=self,
        position={0,-0.05,0.5},
        rotation={180,180,0},
        height=250,
        width=800,
        scale={x=1, y=1, z=1},
        font_size=100,
        font_color=s_color,
        color={0,0,0,0}
        })

    self.createInput({
        value = "Sample Text",
        label = "...",
        input_function = "keepSample", 
        function_owner = self, 
        alignment = f_align,
        position={0,-0.05,1.1},
        rotation={180,180,0},
        width = 1800, 
        height = 250, 
        font_size = 120, 
        scale={x=1, y=1, z=1},
        font_color=f_color,
        color = {0,0,0,0}
        })

    setTooltips()
end

function removeAll()
    self.removeInput(0)
    self.removeInput(1)
    self.removeInput(2)
    self.removeButton(0)
    self.removeButton(1)
    self.removeButton(2)
    self.removeButton(3)
end

function reloadAll()
    removeAll()
    createAll()
    setTooltips()
    updateSave()
end

function update_fcolor()
end

function swap_fcolor(_obj, _color, alt_click)
    light_mode = not light_mode
    reloadAll()
end

function swap_align(_obj, _color, alt_click)
    center_mode = not center_mode
    reloadAll()
end

function swap_tooltip(_obj, _color, alt_click)
    tooltip_show = not tooltip_show
    reloadAll()
    setTooltips()
end

function editName(_obj, _string, value) 
    self.setName(value)
    setTooltips()
end

function editDesc(_obj, _string, value) 
    self.setDescription(value)
    setTooltips()
end

function setTooltips()
    title = self.getName()
    if title == "" then
        title = "Notecard"
    end
    desc = self.getDescription()

    if tooltip_show then
        ttText = title .. "\n----------\n" .. desc
    else
        ttText = ""
    end

    self.editInput({
        index = 0,
        value = self.getName(),
        tooltip = ttText
        })
    self.editInput({
        index = 1,
        value = self.getDescription(),
        tooltip = ttText
        })
end

function null()
end

function keepSample(_obj, _string, value) 
    reloadAll()
end

ObjectStates.Name: Custom_Model_Bag
ObjectStates.LuaScript:
rotate = false


function onLoad()

	guid_bag = self.getGUID()

	params = {
        function_owner = self,
        rotation       = {10, 180, 0},
        width          = 300,
        height         = 150,
        font_size      = 75,
        color          = {0, 0, 0},
        font_color     = {1, 1, 1}
    }

    params.click_function = 'toFold'
    params.label = 'Ranger'
    params.position = {0, -0.25, -0.5}
	  self.createButton(params)

		params.click_function = 'whereLocal'
    params.label = 'local'
    params.position = {3, 0.1, -0.5}
	  --self.createButton(params)

end

function whereLocal ()

	local central_guid = '22a3b3'

	local pos_central = getObjectFromGUID(guid_bag).positionToLocal({3.05, 1.38, -48.76})
  local pos_support_guerrier = getObjectFromGUID(guid_bag).positionToLocal({-14.66, 1.46, -49.73})
	local pos_dice = getObjectFromGUID(guid_bag).positionToLocal({18.19, 2.19, -42.83})
	local pos_mise_en_place = getObjectFromGUID(guid_bag).positionToLocal({-14.89, 1.46, -57.36})
	local pos_fabrication = getObjectFromGUID(guid_bag).positionToLocal({16.40, 1.51, -55.00})
	local pos_tile = getObjectFromGUID(guid_bag).positionToLocal({-1.78, 1.39, -38.65})
  local pos_pv = getObjectFromGUID(guid_bag).positionToLocal({-12.40, 1.53, -61.14})
	local pos_token_on_central = getObjectFromGUID(central_guid).positionToLocal({7.38, 1.60, -51.41})
  local pos_token_on_central2 = getObjectFromGUID(central_guid).positionToLocal({7.04, 1.52, -57.93})
  --local pos_token_on_central3 = getObjectFromGUID(central_guid).positionToLocal({0.42, 1.49, -54.62})
	--local pos_token_on_tile_1 = getObjectFromGUID('04ec1e').positionToLocal({-19.71, 1.53, -56.11})

	log(pos_central,'pos_central')
  log(pos_support_guerrier,'pos_support_guerrier')
	log(pos_fabrication,'pos_fabrication')
  log(pos_pv,'pv')
	log(pos_tile,'pos_tile')
	log(pos_dice,'pos_dice')
	log(pos_mise_en_place,'pos_mise_en_place')
	log(pos_token_on_central,'pos_token_on_central')
  log(pos_token_on_central2,'pos_token_on_central2')
  --log(pos_token_on_central3,'pos_token_on_central3')
	--log(pos_token_on_tile_1,'pos_token_on_tile_1')


end



function onObjectDrop(_, dropped_object)

	if dropped_object.guid == guid_bag then

		local pos_bag = self.getPosition()
		if ((pos_bag.z < -26) and (pos_bag.z > -30)) or ((pos_bag.z < 30) and (pos_bag.z > 26))  then

			if ((pos_bag.x < -62.5) and (pos_bag.x > -67)) or ((pos_bag.x < 2) and (pos_bag.x > -2)) or ((pos_bag.x < 66.5) and (pos_bag.x > 62)) then

				self.shuffle()
				Wait.time(function () toDeployed() end, 0.5)

			end
		end
	end
end



function takeTheObject(position_of_the_object, guid_of_object)

	local params = {
		position = position_of_the_object,
		guid = guid_of_object
	}

	if rotate == false then
		params.rotation = {0, 180, 0}
	elseif rotate == true then
		params.rotation = {0, 0, 0}
	end

	self.takeObject(params)
end



function toMoveTile (pos, guid)

	local pos_tile = getObjectFromGUID(guid_bag).positionToWorld(pos)
	takeTheObject(pos_tile, guid)
	table.insert(fold_guid, guid)

end



function toCleanUpPions(x,guid)

	table.insert(all_pions[x], guid)
	table.insert(fold_guid, guid)

end



function toMovePions(nb_of_lines, first_pion, k, pos_y, pions, nb_of_rows, guid)

	for j = 1, (nb_of_lines*nb_of_rows) do

		takeTheObject((getObjectFromGUID(guid).positionToWorld({first_pion[1] + k*((j-1)%nb_of_rows), pos_y, -first_pion[2] - k*(((j-1)-(j-1)%nb_of_rows)/nb_of_rows)})), pions[j])

	end
end



function toDeployed()

	fold_guid = {}

	local obj_in_bag = self.getObjects()
	all_pions = {{},{},{},{},{},{},{}}
	central_board = ''
	warrior_board = ''

  local y = 0.1

	local bag_pos = self.getPosition()

	if bag_pos.z > 28 and bag_pos.z < 29 then
		rotate = true
	else
		rotate = false
	end

  local n = #obj_in_bag
  if n ~= 0 then

    for k, value in pairs(obj_in_bag) do

  		if value.name == 'Plateau Joueur' then
  			toMoveTile({0.71, y, -5.5}, value.guid)
  			central_board = value.guid

      elseif value.name == 'Réserve de Guerriers' then
        toMoveTile({-2.82, y, -4.18}, value.guid)
        warrior_board = value.guid

      elseif value.name == 'PV' then
        toMoveTile({-2.37, y, -6.46}, value.guid)

      elseif value.name == 'Fabrications persistantes' then
        toMoveTile({3.75, y, -5.23}, value.guid)

      elseif value.name == 'Dé' then
        toCleanUpPions(1, value.guid)

      elseif value.name == 'Guerrier' then
        toCleanUpPions(2, value.guid)

  		elseif value.name == 'Mise en place' then
        toCleanUpPions(3, value.guid)

      elseif value.name == 'Main Compagnie' then
        toMoveTile({-0.24, y, -1.94}, value.guid)

      elseif value.name == 'Marqueur de Service' then
        toCleanUpPions(4, value.guid)

      elseif value.name == 'Comptoir Renard' then
        toCleanUpPions(5, value.guid)

			elseif value.name == 'Comptoir Lapin' then
				toCleanUpPions(6, value.guid)

			elseif value.name == 'Comptoir Souris' then
				toCleanUpPions(7, value.guid)

  		end
  	end

    Wait.time(function () takeThePions(all_pions) end, 2)

  end

end




function takeThePions(table_pions)

	local pos_y = 0.7
	for i = 1,7 do

		local pions = table_pions[i]

		if i == 1 then  --Dé

			local k = 0.5
			local nb_of_lines = 1
			local first_pion = {3.7, 2.8}
			local nb_of_rows = 2

			toMovePions(nb_of_lines, first_pion, k, pos_y, pions, nb_of_rows, guid_bag)

		elseif i == 2 then --Guerrier

      local k = -0.6
			local nb_of_lines = 3
			local first_pion = {1.2, 1.2}
			local nb_of_rows = 5

			toMovePions(nb_of_lines, first_pion, k, pos_y, pions, nb_of_rows, warrior_board)

    elseif i == 3 then  --mise en place

      local k = 1.7
			local nb_of_lines = 1
			local first_pion = {-3.5, 6}
			local nb_of_rows = 1

			toMovePions(nb_of_lines, first_pion, k, pos_y, pions, nb_of_rows, guid_bag)

    elseif i == 4 then --tokens on central tile

      local k = -0.12
			local nb_of_lines = 3
			local first_pion = {-0.77, 0.278}
			local nb_of_rows = 1

			toMovePions(nb_of_lines, first_pion, k, pos_y, pions, nb_of_rows, central_board)

    elseif i == 5 then

      local k = -0.2
      local nb_of_lines = 1
      local first_pion = {-0.73, -0.46}
      local nb_of_rows = 3

      toMovePions(nb_of_lines, first_pion, k, pos_y, pions, nb_of_rows, central_board)

		elseif i == 6 then

			local k = -0.2
			local nb_of_lines = 1
			local first_pion = {-0.73, -0.63}
			local nb_of_rows = 3

			toMovePions(nb_of_lines, first_pion, k, pos_y, pions, nb_of_rows, central_board)

		elseif i == 7 then

			local k = -0.2
			local nb_of_lines = 1
			local first_pion = {-0.73, -0.80}
			local nb_of_rows = 3

			toMovePions(nb_of_lines, first_pion, k, pos_y, pions, nb_of_rows, central_board)


		end
	end
end


function toFold()

	local n = #fold_guid

	if n ~= 0 then
		for i = 1,n do
			self.putObject(getObjectFromGUID(fold_guid[i]))
		end
	end

	fold_guid = {}

end

rotate = false


function onLoad()

	guid_bag = self.getGUID()

	params = {
        function_owner = self,
        rotation       = {10, 180, 0},
        width          = 600,
        height         = 300,
        font_size      = 150,
        color          = {0, 0, 0},
        font_color     = {1, 1, 1}
    }

    params.click_function = 'toFold'
    params.label = 'Ranger'
    params.position = {0, -0.25, -1}
	  self.createButton(params)

end



function onObjectDrop(_, dropped_object)

	if dropped_object.guid == guid_bag then

		local pos_bag = self.getPosition()
		if ((pos_bag.z < -26) and (pos_bag.z > -30)) or ((pos_bag.z < 30) and (pos_bag.z > 26))  then

			if ((pos_bag.x < -62.5) and (pos_bag.x > -67)) or ((pos_bag.x < 2) and (pos_bag.x > -2)) or ((pos_bag.x < 66.5) and (pos_bag.x > 62)) then

				self.shuffle()
				Wait.time(function () toDeployed() end, 0.5)

			end
		end
	end
end



function takeTheObject(position_of_the_object, guid_of_object)

	local params = {
		position = position_of_the_object,
		guid = guid_of_object
	}

	if rotate == false then
		params.rotation = {0, 180, 0}
	elseif rotate == true then
		params.rotation = {0, 0, 0}
	end

	self.takeObject(params)
end



function toMoveTile (pos, guid)

	local pos_tile = getObjectFromGUID(guid_bag).positionToWorld(pos)
	takeTheObject(pos_tile, guid)
	table.insert(fold_guid, guid)

end



function toCleanUpPions(x,guid)

	table.insert(all_pions[x], guid)
	table.insert(fold_guid, guid)

end



function toMovePions(nb_of_lines, first_pion, k, pos_y, pions, nb_of_rows, guid)

	for j = 1, (nb_of_lines*nb_of_rows) do

		takeTheObject((getObjectFromGUID(guid).positionToWorld({first_pion[1] + k*((j-1)%nb_of_rows), pos_y, -first_pion[2] - k*(((j-1)-(j-1)%nb_of_rows)/nb_of_rows)})), pions[j])

	end
end



function toDeployed()

	fold_guid = {}

	local obj_in_bag = self.getObjects()
	all_pions = {{},{},{},{}}
	central_board = ''
	warrior_board = ''

	local bag_pos = self.getPosition()

	if bag_pos.z > 28 and bag_pos.z < 29 then
		rotate = true
	else
		rotate = false
	end

  local n = #obj_in_bag
  if n ~= 0 then

    for k, value in pairs(obj_in_bag) do

  		if value.name == 'Plateau Joueur' then
  			toMoveTile({-0.5, 0.1, -8}, value.guid)
  			central_board = value.guid

      elseif value.name == 'Dé' then
        toCleanUpPions(1, value.guid)

      elseif value.name == 'Guerrier' then
        toCleanUpPions(2, value.guid)

      elseif value.name == 'Réserve de Guerriers' then
        toMoveTile({-7, 0.1, -5}, value.guid)
        warrior_board = value.guid

  		elseif value.name == 'Mise en place' then
        toCleanUpPions(3, value.guid)

      elseif value.name == 'PV' then
        toMoveTile({0, 0.1, -2}, value.guid)

      elseif value.name == 'Fabrications persistantes' then
        toMoveTile({7.5, 0.1, -9.5}, value.guid)

      elseif value.name == 'Complot' then
        toCleanUpPions(4, value.guid)

  		elseif value.name == 'Piste Complots' then
  			toMoveTile({-7, 0.1, -10}, value.guid)

  		end
  	end

    Wait.time(function () takeThePions(all_pions) end, 1.5)

  end
end




function takeThePions(table_pions)

	local pos_y = 2
	for i = 1,4 do

		local pions = table_pions[i]

		if i == 1 then  --Dé
			local k = 1
			local nb_of_lines = 1
			local first_pion = {-2, 1.5}
			local nb_of_rows = 2

			toMovePions(nb_of_lines, first_pion, k, pos_y, pions, nb_of_rows, guid_bag)

		elseif i == 2 then --Guerrier
      local k = -0.6
			local nb_of_lines = 3
			local first_pion = {1.2, 1.2}
			local nb_of_rows = 5

			toMovePions(nb_of_lines, first_pion, k, pos_y, pions, nb_of_rows, warrior_board)

    elseif i == 3 then  --mise en place
      local k = 1
			local nb_of_lines = 1
			local first_pion = {-4, 2}
			local nb_of_rows = 1

			toMovePions(nb_of_lines, first_pion, k, pos_y, pions, nb_of_rows, guid_bag)


    elseif i == 4 then --Complot
      local k = -0.95
			local nb_of_lines = 4
			local first_pion = {0.475, 1.2}
			local nb_of_rows = 2

			toMovePions(nb_of_lines, first_pion, k, pos_y, pions, nb_of_rows, '1890bb')

		end
	end
end




function toFold()

	local n = #fold_guid

	if n ~= 0 then
		for i = 1,n do
			self.putObject(getObjectFromGUID(fold_guid[i]))
		end
	end

	fold_guid = {}
end

ContainedObjects.Name: Custom_Token
ContainedObjects.Description:
- Placez 1 guerrier dans une clairière Lapin, Souris et Renard au choix.
- Placez votre jeton PV sur la piste de score.
- Piochez 3 cartes.
ContainedObjects.LuaScript:
function onload(saved_data)
    f_size = 260
    light_mode = false
    center_mode = false
    tooltip_show = true

    if saved_data ~= "" then
        local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
        light_mode = loaded_data[1]
        center_mode = loaded_data[2]
        tooltip_show = loaded_data[3]
    end

    createAll()
end

function updateSave()
    local data_to_save = {light_mode, center_mode, tooltip_show}
    saved_data = JSON.encode(data_to_save)
    self.script_state = saved_data
end

function createAll()
    s_color = {0.5, 0.5, 0.5, 95}

    if light_mode then
        f_color = {1,1,1,95}
    else
        f_color = {0,0,0,95}
    end

    if center_mode then
        f_align = 3
    else
        f_align = 1
    end

    if tooltip_show then
        ttText = self.getName() .. "\n----------\n" .. self.getDescription()
    else
        ttText = ""
    end

    self.createInput({
        value = self.getName(), 
        input_function = "editName", 
        label = "Notecard",
        function_owner = self, 
        alignment = 3,
        position = {0,0.05,-1}, 
        width = 1800, 
        height = 300, 
        font_size = 160, 
        scale={x=1, y=1, z=1},
        font_color= f_color,
        color = {0,0,0,0},
        tooltip = ttText
        })

    self.createInput({
        value = self.getDescription(), 
        label = "\nClick and type here\n\nFlip for settings",
        input_function = "editDesc", 
        function_owner = self, 
        alignment = f_align,
        position = {0,0.05,0.28}, 
        width = 1800, 
        height = 1000, 
        font_size = 120, 
        scale={x=1, y=1, z=1},
        font_color=f_color,
        color = {0,0,0,0},
        tooltip = ttText
        })

    self.createButton({
        label="- Notecard Settings -",
        tooltip="- Notecard Settings -",
        click_function="null",
        function_owner=self,
        position={0,-0.05,-1.1},
        rotation={180,180,0},
        height=300,
        width=800,
        scale={x=1, y=1, z=1},
        font_size=140,
        font_color=s_color,
        color={0,0,0,0}
        })

    if light_mode then
        lightButtonText = "[ Set dark text ]"
    else
        lightButtonText = "[ Set light text ]"
    end
    self.createButton({
        label=lightButtonText,
        tooltip=lightButtonText,
        click_function="swap_fcolor",
        function_owner=self,
        position={0,-0.05,-0.5},
        rotation={180,180,0},
        height=250,
        width=800,
        scale={x=1, y=1, z=1},
        font_size=100,
        font_color=s_color,
        color={0,0,0,0}
        })

    if center_mode then
        centerButtonText = "[ Set left align ]"
    else
        centerButtonText = "[ Set center align ]"
    end
    self.createButton({
        label=centerButtonText,
        tooltip=centerButtonText,
        click_function="swap_align",
        function_owner=self,
        position={0,-0.05,0},
        rotation={180,180,0},
        height=250,
        width=800,
        scale={x=1, y=1, z=1},
        font_size=100,
        font_color=s_color,
        color={0,0,0,0}
        })

    if tooltip_show then
        tooltipShowText = "[ Hide description in tooltip ]"
    else
        tooltipShowText = "[ Show description in tooltip ]"
    end
    self.createButton({
        label=tooltipShowText,
        tooltip=tooltipShowText,
        click_function="swap_tooltip",
        function_owner=self,
        position={0,-0.05,0.5},
        rotation={180,180,0},
        height=250,
        width=800,
        scale={x=1, y=1, z=1},
        font_size=100,
        font_color=s_color,
        color={0,0,0,0}
        })

    self.createInput({
        value = "Sample Text",
        label = "...",
        input_function = "keepSample", 
        function_owner = self, 
        alignment = f_align,
        position={0,-0.05,1.1},
        rotation={180,180,0},
        width = 1800, 
        height = 250, 
        font_size = 120, 
        scale={x=1, y=1, z=1},
        font_color=f_color,
        color = {0,0,0,0}
        })

    setTooltips()
end

function removeAll()
    self.removeInput(0)
    self.removeInput(1)
    self.removeInput(2)
    self.removeButton(0)
    self.removeButton(1)
    self.removeButton(2)
    self.removeButton(3)
end

function reloadAll()
    removeAll()
    createAll()
    setTooltips()
    updateSave()
end

function update_fcolor()
end

function swap_fcolor(_obj, _color, alt_click)
    light_mode = not light_mode
    reloadAll()
end

function swap_align(_obj, _color, alt_click)
    center_mode = not center_mode
    reloadAll()
end

function swap_tooltip(_obj, _color, alt_click)
    tooltip_show = not tooltip_show
    reloadAll()
    setTooltips()
end

function editName(_obj, _string, value) 
    self.setName(value)
    setTooltips()
end

function editDesc(_obj, _string, value) 
    self.setDescription(value)
    setTooltips()
end

function setTooltips()
    title = self.getName()
    if title == "" then
        title = "Notecard"
    end
    desc = self.getDescription()

    if tooltip_show then
        ttText = title .. "\n----------\n" .. desc
    else
        ttText = ""
    end

    self.editInput({
        index = 0,
        value = self.getName(),
        tooltip = ttText
        })
    self.editInput({
        index = 1,
        value = self.getDescription(),
        tooltip = ttText
        })
end

function null()
end

function keepSample(_obj, _string, value) 
    reloadAll()
end

ObjectStates.Name: Custom_Model_Bag
ObjectStates.LuaScript:
rotate = false


function onLoad()

	guid_bag = self.getGUID()

	params = {
        function_owner = self,
        rotation       = {10, 180, 0},
        width          = 600,
        height         = 300,
        font_size      = 150,
        color          = {0, 0, 0},
        font_color     = {1, 1, 1}
    }

    params.click_function = 'toFold'
    params.label = 'Ranger'
    params.position = {0, -0.4, -1}
	  self.createButton(params)

		params.click_function = 'whereLocal'
    params.label = 'local'
    params.position = {3, 0.1, -0.5}
	  --self.createButton(params)

end

function whereLocal ()

	local central_guid = '22a3b3'

	local pos_central = getObjectFromGUID(guid_bag).positionToLocal({3.05, 1.38, -48.76})
  local pos_support_guerrier = getObjectFromGUID(guid_bag).positionToLocal({-14.66, 1.46, -49.73})
	local pos_dice = getObjectFromGUID(guid_bag).positionToLocal({18.19, 2.19, -42.83})
	local pos_mise_en_place = getObjectFromGUID(guid_bag).positionToLocal({-14.89, 1.46, -57.36})
	local pos_fabrication = getObjectFromGUID(guid_bag).positionToLocal({16.40, 1.51, -55.00})
	local pos_tile = getObjectFromGUID(guid_bag).positionToLocal({-1.78, 1.39, -38.65})
  local pos_pv = getObjectFromGUID(guid_bag).positionToLocal({-12.40, 1.53, -61.14})
	local pos_token_on_central = getObjectFromGUID(central_guid).positionToLocal({7.38, 1.60, -51.41})
  local pos_token_on_central2 = getObjectFromGUID(central_guid).positionToLocal({7.04, 1.52, -57.93})
  --local pos_token_on_central3 = getObjectFromGUID(central_guid).positionToLocal({0.42, 1.49, -54.62})
	--local pos_token_on_tile_1 = getObjectFromGUID('04ec1e').positionToLocal({-19.71, 1.53, -56.11})

	log(pos_central,'pos_central')
  log(pos_support_guerrier,'pos_support_guerrier')
	log(pos_fabrication,'pos_fabrication')
  log(pos_pv,'pv')
	log(pos_tile,'pos_tile')
	log(pos_dice,'pos_dice')
	log(pos_mise_en_place,'pos_mise_en_place')
	log(pos_token_on_central,'pos_token_on_central')
  log(pos_token_on_central2,'pos_token_on_central2')
  --log(pos_token_on_central3,'pos_token_on_central3')
	--log(pos_token_on_tile_1,'pos_token_on_tile_1')


end



function onObjectDrop(_, dropped_object)

	if dropped_object.guid == guid_bag then

		local pos_bag = self.getPosition()
		if ((pos_bag.z < -26) and (pos_bag.z > -30)) or ((pos_bag.z < 30) and (pos_bag.z > 26))  then

			if ((pos_bag.x < -62.5) and (pos_bag.x > -67)) or ((pos_bag.x < 2) and (pos_bag.x > -2)) or ((pos_bag.x < 66.5) and (pos_bag.x > 62)) then

				self.shuffle()
				Wait.time(function () toDeployed() end, 0.5)

			end
		end
	end
end



function takeTheObject(position_of_the_object, guid_of_object)

	local params = {
		position = position_of_the_object,
		guid = guid_of_object
	}

	if rotate == false then
		params.rotation = {0, 180, 0}
	elseif rotate == true then
		params.rotation = {0, 0, 0}
	end

	self.takeObject(params)
end



function toMoveTile (pos, guid)

	local pos_tile = getObjectFromGUID(guid_bag).positionToWorld(pos)
	takeTheObject(pos_tile, guid)
	table.insert(fold_guid, guid)

end



function toCleanUpPions(x,guid)

	table.insert(all_pions[x], guid)
	table.insert(fold_guid, guid)

end



function toMovePions(nb_of_lines, first_pion, k, pos_y, pions, nb_of_rows, guid)

	for j = 1, (nb_of_lines*nb_of_rows) do

		takeTheObject((getObjectFromGUID(guid).positionToWorld({first_pion[1] + k*((j-1)%nb_of_rows), pos_y, -first_pion[2] - k*(((j-1)-(j-1)%nb_of_rows)/nb_of_rows)})), pions[j])

	end
end



function toDeployed()

	fold_guid = {}

	local obj_in_bag = self.getObjects()
	all_pions = {{},{},{},{},{},{},{},{},{}}
	central_board = ''
	warrior_board = ''

  local y = 0.1

	local bag_pos = self.getPosition()

	if bag_pos.z > 28 and bag_pos.z < 29 then
		rotate = true
	else
		rotate = false
	end

  local n = #obj_in_bag
  if n ~= 0 then

    for k, value in pairs(obj_in_bag) do

  		if value.name == 'Plateau Joueur' then
  			toMoveTile({0.71, y, -11}, value.guid)
  			central_board = value.guid

      elseif value.name == 'Réserve de Guerriers' then
        toMoveTile({-7, y, -8.36}, value.guid)
        warrior_board = value.guid

      elseif value.name == 'PV' then
        toMoveTile({-2, y, -0.5}, value.guid)

      elseif value.name == 'Fabrications persistantes' then
        toMoveTile({7.5, y, -11}, value.guid)

      elseif value.name == 'Piste élection' then
        toMoveTile({0.71, y, -3.23}, value.guid)

      elseif value.name == 'Terrier' then
        toMoveTile({-7, y, -15}, value.guid)

      elseif value.tag == 'Card' then
        toMoveTile({3, 0.5, -11}, value.guid)

      elseif value.name == 'Dé' then
        toCleanUpPions(1, value.guid)

      elseif value.name == 'Guerrier' then
        toCleanUpPions(2, value.guid)

  		elseif value.name == 'Mise en place' then
        toCleanUpPions(3, value.guid)

      elseif value.name == 'Couronne Chatelain' then
        toCleanUpPions(4, value.guid)

      elseif value.name == 'Couronne Noble' then
        toCleanUpPions(5, value.guid)

			elseif value.name == 'Couronne Seigneur' then
				toCleanUpPions(6, value.guid)

			elseif value.name == 'Tunnel' then
				toCleanUpPions(7, value.guid)

      elseif value.name == 'Citadelle' then
        toCleanUpPions(8, value.guid)

      elseif value.name == 'Marché' then
        toCleanUpPions(9, value.guid)

			elseif value.name == 'Ministre' then
			toMoveTile({2.7, 0.5, -12.7}, value.guid)


    	end
  	end

    Wait.time(function () takeThePions(all_pions) end, 2)

  end

end




function takeThePions(table_pions)

	local pos_y = 0.7
	for i = 1,9 do

		local pions = table_pions[i]

		if i == 1 then  --Dé

			local k = 0.5
			local nb_of_lines = 1
			local first_pion = {3.7, 6.5}
			local nb_of_rows = 2

			toMovePions(nb_of_lines, first_pion, k, pos_y, pions, nb_of_rows, guid_bag)

		elseif i == 2 then --Guerrier

      local k = -0.6
			local nb_of_lines = 4
			local first_pion = {1.2, 1.2}
			local nb_of_rows = 5

			toMovePions(nb_of_lines, first_pion, k, pos_y, pions, nb_of_rows, warrior_board)

    elseif i == 3 then  --mise en place

      local k = 1.7
			local nb_of_lines = 1
			local first_pion = {-7, 12}
			local nb_of_rows = 1

			toMovePions(nb_of_lines, first_pion, k, pos_y, pions, nb_of_rows, guid_bag)

    elseif i == 4 then --tokens on central tile

      local k = -0.11
			local nb_of_lines = 1
			local first_pion = {1.06, -0.345}
			local nb_of_rows = 3

			toMovePions(nb_of_lines, first_pion, k, pos_y, pions, nb_of_rows, central_board)

    elseif i == 5 then

      local k = -0.11
      local nb_of_lines = 1
      local first_pion = {0.65, -0.345}
      local nb_of_rows = 3

      toMovePions(nb_of_lines, first_pion, k, pos_y, pions, nb_of_rows, central_board)

		elseif i == 6 then

			local k = -0.11
			local nb_of_lines = 1
			local first_pion = {0.24, -0.345}
			local nb_of_rows = 3

			toMovePions(nb_of_lines, first_pion, k, pos_y, pions, nb_of_rows, central_board)

		elseif i == 7 then

			local k = -0.19
			local nb_of_lines = 3
			local first_pion = {-1.15, 0.32}
			local nb_of_rows = 1

			toMovePions(nb_of_lines, first_pion, k, pos_y, pions, nb_of_rows, central_board)

    elseif i == 8 then

      local k = -0.18
      local nb_of_lines = 1
      local first_pion = {-0.445, 0.297}
      local nb_of_rows = 3

      toMovePions(nb_of_lines, first_pion, k, pos_y, pions, nb_of_rows, central_board)

    elseif i == 9 then

      local k = -0.18
      local nb_of_lines = 1
      local first_pion = {-0.445, 0.094}
      local nb_of_rows = 3

      toMovePions(nb_of_lines, first_pion, k, pos_y, pions, nb_of_rows, central_board)

		end
	end

	Wait.time(function() moveCentralTile() end, 3)
end

function moveCentralTile()

	local pos_central_board = getObjectFromGUID(central_board).getPosition()
	getObjectFromGUID(central_board).setPositionSmooth({pos_central_board.x, pos_central_board.y+0.02, pos_central_board.z})

end


function toFold()

	local n = #fold_guid

	if n ~= 0 then
		for i = 1,n do
			self.putObject(getObjectFromGUID(fold_guid[i]))
		end
	end

	fold_guid = {}

end

ObjectStates.Name: Custom_Model_Bag
ObjectStates.LuaScript:
rotate = false


function onLoad()

	guid_bag = self.getGUID()

	params = {
        function_owner = self,
        rotation       = {10, 180, 0},
        width          = 1500,
        height         = 600,
        font_size      = 400,
        color          = {0, 0, 0},
        font_color     = {1, 1, 1}
    }

    params.click_function = 'toFold'
    params.label = 'Ranger'
    params.position = {0, 0.2, -2}
	  self.createButton(params)

		params.click_function = 'whereLocal'
    params.label = 'local'
    params.position = {3, 0.1, -0.5}
	  --self.createButton(params)

end

function whereLocal ()

	local central_guid = '22a3b3'

	local pos_central = getObjectFromGUID(guid_bag).positionToLocal({3.05, 1.38, -48.76})
  local pos_support_guerrier = getObjectFromGUID(guid_bag).positionToLocal({-14.66, 1.46, -49.73})
	local pos_dice = getObjectFromGUID(guid_bag).positionToLocal({18.19, 2.19, -42.83})
	local pos_mise_en_place = getObjectFromGUID(guid_bag).positionToLocal({-14.89, 1.46, -57.36})
	local pos_fabrication = getObjectFromGUID(guid_bag).positionToLocal({16.40, 1.51, -55.00})
	local pos_tile = getObjectFromGUID(guid_bag).positionToLocal({-1.78, 1.39, -38.65})
  local pos_pv = getObjectFromGUID(guid_bag).positionToLocal({-12.40, 1.53, -61.14})
	local pos_token_on_central = getObjectFromGUID(central_guid).positionToLocal({7.38, 1.60, -51.41})
  local pos_token_on_central2 = getObjectFromGUID(central_guid).positionToLocal({7.04, 1.52, -57.93})
  --local pos_token_on_central3 = getObjectFromGUID(central_guid).positionToLocal({0.42, 1.49, -54.62})
	--local pos_token_on_tile_1 = getObjectFromGUID('04ec1e').positionToLocal({-19.71, 1.53, -56.11})

	log(pos_central,'pos_central')
  log(pos_support_guerrier,'pos_support_guerrier')
	log(pos_fabrication,'pos_fabrication')
  log(pos_pv,'pv')
	log(pos_tile,'pos_tile')
	log(pos_dice,'pos_dice')
	log(pos_mise_en_place,'pos_mise_en_place')
	log(pos_token_on_central,'pos_token_on_central')
  log(pos_token_on_central2,'pos_token_on_central2')
  --log(pos_token_on_central3,'pos_token_on_central3')
	--log(pos_token_on_tile_1,'pos_token_on_tile_1')


end



function onObjectDrop(_, dropped_object)

	if dropped_object.guid == guid_bag then

		local pos_bag = self.getPosition()
		if ((pos_bag.z < -26) and (pos_bag.z > -30)) or ((pos_bag.z < 30) and (pos_bag.z > 26))  then

			if ((pos_bag.x < -62.5) and (pos_bag.x > -67)) or ((pos_bag.x < 2) and (pos_bag.x > -2)) or ((pos_bag.x < 66.5) and (pos_bag.x > 62)) then

				self.shuffle()
				Wait.time(function () toDeployed() end, 0.5)

			end
		end
	end
end



function takeTheObject(position_of_the_object, guid_of_object)

	local params = {
		position = position_of_the_object,
		guid = guid_of_object
	}

	if rotate == false then
		params.rotation = {0, 180, 0}
	elseif rotate == true then
		params.rotation = {0, 0, 0}
	end

	self.takeObject(params)
end



function toMoveTile (pos, guid)

	local pos_tile = getObjectFromGUID(guid_bag).positionToWorld(pos)
	takeTheObject(pos_tile, guid)
	table.insert(fold_guid, guid)

end



function toCleanUpPions(x,guid)

	table.insert(all_pions[x], guid)
	table.insert(fold_guid, guid)

end



function toMovePions(nb_of_lines, first_pion, k, pos_y, pions, nb_of_rows, guid)

	for j = 1, (nb_of_lines*nb_of_rows) do

		takeTheObject((getObjectFromGUID(guid).positionToWorld({first_pion[1] + k*((j-1)%nb_of_rows), pos_y, -first_pion[2] - k*(((j-1)-(j-1)%nb_of_rows)/nb_of_rows)})), pions[j])

	end
end



function toDeployed()

	fold_guid = {}

	local obj_in_bag = self.getObjects()
	all_pions = {{},{},{},{},{},{},{}}
	central_board = ''
	warrior_board = ''

  local y = 0.1

	local bag_pos = self.getPosition()

	if bag_pos.z > 28 and bag_pos.z < 29 then
		rotate = true
	else
		rotate = false
	end

  local n = #obj_in_bag
  if n ~= 0 then

    for k, value in pairs(obj_in_bag) do

  		if value.name == 'Plateau Joueur' then
  			toMoveTile({0.71, y, -20}, value.guid)
  			central_board = value.guid

      elseif value.name == 'Réserve de Guerriers' then
        toMoveTile({-20, y, -17}, value.guid)
        warrior_board = value.guid

      elseif value.name == 'PV' then
        toMoveTile({-4, y, -2}, value.guid)

      elseif value.name == 'Fabrications persistantes' then
        toMoveTile({22, y, -20}, value.guid)

      elseif value.name == 'Dé' then
        toCleanUpPions(1, value.guid)

      elseif value.name == 'Guerrier' then
        toCleanUpPions(2, value.guid)

  		elseif value.name == 'Mise en place' then
        toCleanUpPions(3, value.guid)

      elseif value.name == 'Ecole' then
        toCleanUpPions(4, value.guid)

      elseif value.name == 'Dispensaire' then
        toCleanUpPions(5, value.guid)

			elseif value.name == 'Cessez-le-feu' then
				toCleanUpPions(6, value.guid)

			elseif value.name == 'Pacification' then
				toCleanUpPions(7, value.guid)


    	end
  	end

    Wait.time(function () takeThePions(all_pions) end, 2)

  end

end




function takeThePions(table_pions)

	local pos_y = 0.7
	for i = 1,7 do

		local pions = table_pions[i]

		if i == 1 then  --Dé

			local k = 4
			local nb_of_lines = 1
			local first_pion = {3.7, 6.5}
			local nb_of_rows = 2

			toMovePions(nb_of_lines, first_pion, k, pos_y, pions, nb_of_rows, guid_bag)

		elseif i == 2 then --Guerrier

      local k = -0.6
			local nb_of_lines = 3
			local first_pion = {1.2, 1.2}
			local nb_of_rows = 5

			toMovePions(nb_of_lines, first_pion, k, pos_y, pions, nb_of_rows, warrior_board)

    elseif i == 3 then  --mise en place

      local k = 1.7
			local nb_of_lines = 1
			local first_pion = {-10, 5}
			local nb_of_rows = 1

			toMovePions(nb_of_lines, first_pion, k, pos_y, pions, nb_of_rows, guid_bag)

    elseif i == 4 then --tokens on central tile

      local k = -0.2
			local nb_of_lines = 1
			local first_pion = {-0.9, 0.05}
			local nb_of_rows = 2

			toMovePions(nb_of_lines, first_pion, k, pos_y, pions, nb_of_rows, central_board)

    elseif i == 5 then

      local k = -0.2
      local nb_of_lines = 1
      local first_pion = {-0.9, 0.25}
      local nb_of_rows = 2

      toMovePions(nb_of_lines, first_pion, k, pos_y, pions, nb_of_rows, central_board)

		elseif i == 6 then

			local k = -0.2
			local nb_of_lines = 1
			local first_pion = {1.05,-0.5}
			local nb_of_rows = 3

			toMovePions(nb_of_lines, first_pion, k, pos_y, pions, nb_of_rows, central_board)

		elseif i == 7 then

			local k = -0.20
			local nb_of_lines = 1
			local first_pion = {1.05, -0.8}
			local nb_of_rows = 3

			toMovePions(nb_of_lines, first_pion, k, pos_y, pions, nb_of_rows, central_board)

		end
	end

	Wait.time(function() moveCentralTile() end, 3)
end

function moveCentralTile()

	local pos_central_board = getObjectFromGUID(central_board).getPosition()
	getObjectFromGUID(central_board).setPositionSmooth({pos_central_board.x, pos_central_board.y+0.02, pos_central_board.z})

end


function toFold()

	local n = #fold_guid

	if n ~= 0 then
		for i = 1,n do
			self.putObject(getObjectFromGUID(fold_guid[i]))
		end
	end

	fold_guid = {}

end

ContainedObjects.Name: Custom_Token
ContainedObjects.Description:
- Placez 6 guerriers et 1 jeton Cessez-le-feu dans une ou plusieurs clairières centrales, répartis comme vous le souhaitez.
- Piochez 3 cartes.
ContainedObjects.LuaScript:
function onload(saved_data)
    f_size = 260
    light_mode = false
    center_mode = false
    tooltip_show = true

    if saved_data ~= "" then
        local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
        light_mode = loaded_data[1]
        center_mode = loaded_data[2]
        tooltip_show = loaded_data[3]
    end

    createAll()
end

function updateSave()
    local data_to_save = {light_mode, center_mode, tooltip_show}
    saved_data = JSON.encode(data_to_save)
    self.script_state = saved_data
end

function createAll()
    s_color = {0.5, 0.5, 0.5, 95}

    if light_mode then
        f_color = {1,1,1,95}
    else
        f_color = {0,0,0,95}
    end

    if center_mode then
        f_align = 3
    else
        f_align = 1
    end

    if tooltip_show then
        ttText = self.getName() .. "\n----------\n" .. self.getDescription()
    else
        ttText = ""
    end

    self.createInput({
        value = self.getName(), 
        input_function = "editName", 
        label = "Notecard",
        function_owner = self, 
        alignment = 3,
        position = {0,0.05,-1}, 
        width = 1800, 
        height = 300, 
        font_size = 160, 
        scale={x=1, y=1, z=1},
        font_color= f_color,
        color = {0,0,0,0},
        tooltip = ttText
        })

    self.createInput({
        value = self.getDescription(), 
        label = "\nClick and type here\n\nFlip for settings",
        input_function = "editDesc", 
        function_owner = self, 
        alignment = f_align,
        position = {0,0.05,0.28}, 
        width = 1800, 
        height = 1000, 
        font_size = 120, 
        scale={x=1, y=1, z=1},
        font_color=f_color,
        color = {0,0,0,0},
        tooltip = ttText
        })

    self.createButton({
        label="- Notecard Settings -",
        tooltip="- Notecard Settings -",
        click_function="null",
        function_owner=self,
        position={0,-0.05,-1.1},
        rotation={180,180,0},
        height=300,
        width=800,
        scale={x=1, y=1, z=1},
        font_size=140,
        font_color=s_color,
        color={0,0,0,0}
        })

    if light_mode then
        lightButtonText = "[ Set dark text ]"
    else
        lightButtonText = "[ Set light text ]"
    end
    self.createButton({
        label=lightButtonText,
        tooltip=lightButtonText,
        click_function="swap_fcolor",
        function_owner=self,
        position={0,-0.05,-0.5},
        rotation={180,180,0},
        height=250,
        width=800,
        scale={x=1, y=1, z=1},
        font_size=100,
        font_color=s_color,
        color={0,0,0,0}
        })

    if center_mode then
        centerButtonText = "[ Set left align ]"
    else
        centerButtonText = "[ Set center align ]"
    end
    self.createButton({
        label=centerButtonText,
        tooltip=centerButtonText,
        click_function="swap_align",
        function_owner=self,
        position={0,-0.05,0},
        rotation={180,180,0},
        height=250,
        width=800,
        scale={x=1, y=1, z=1},
        font_size=100,
        font_color=s_color,
        color={0,0,0,0}
        })

    if tooltip_show then
        tooltipShowText = "[ Hide description in tooltip ]"
    else
        tooltipShowText = "[ Show description in tooltip ]"
    end
    self.createButton({
        label=tooltipShowText,
        tooltip=tooltipShowText,
        click_function="swap_tooltip",
        function_owner=self,
        position={0,-0.05,0.5},
        rotation={180,180,0},
        height=250,
        width=800,
        scale={x=1, y=1, z=1},
        font_size=100,
        font_color=s_color,
        color={0,0,0,0}
        })

    self.createInput({
        value = "Sample Text",
        label = "...",
        input_function = "keepSample", 
        function_owner = self, 
        alignment = f_align,
        position={0,-0.05,1.1},
        rotation={180,180,0},
        width = 1800, 
        height = 250, 
        font_size = 120, 
        scale={x=1, y=1, z=1},
        font_color=f_color,
        color = {0,0,0,0}
        })

    setTooltips()
end

function removeAll()
    self.removeInput(0)
    self.removeInput(1)
    self.removeInput(2)
    self.removeButton(0)
    self.removeButton(1)
    self.removeButton(2)
    self.removeButton(3)
end

function reloadAll()
    removeAll()
    createAll()
    setTooltips()
    updateSave()
end

function update_fcolor()
end

function swap_fcolor(_obj, _color, alt_click)
    light_mode = not light_mode
    reloadAll()
end

function swap_align(_obj, _color, alt_click)
    center_mode = not center_mode
    reloadAll()
end

function swap_tooltip(_obj, _color, alt_click)
    tooltip_show = not tooltip_show
    reloadAll()
    setTooltips()
end

function editName(_obj, _string, value) 
    self.setName(value)
    setTooltips()
end

function editDesc(_obj, _string, value) 
    self.setDescription(value)
    setTooltips()
end

function setTooltips()
    title = self.getName()
    if title == "" then
        title = "Notecard"
    end
    desc = self.getDescription()

    if tooltip_show then
        ttText = title .. "\n----------\n" .. desc
    else
        ttText = ""
    end

    self.editInput({
        index = 0,
        value = self.getName(),
        tooltip = ttText
        })
    self.editInput({
        index = 1,
        value = self.getDescription(),
        tooltip = ttText
        })
end

function null()
end

function keepSample(_obj, _string, value) 
    reloadAll()
end

ObjectStates.Name: Custom_Model_Bag
ObjectStates.LuaScript:
rotate = false


function onLoad()

	guid_bag = self.getGUID()

	params = {
        function_owner = self,
        rotation       = {10, 180, 0},
        width          = 700,
        height         = 400,
        font_size      = 175,
        color          = {0, 0, 0},
        font_color     = {1, 1, 1}
    }

    params.click_function = 'toFold'
    params.label = 'Ranger'
    params.position = {0, 0.1, -1.5}
	  self.createButton(params)

end



function onObjectDrop(_, dropped_object)

	if dropped_object.guid == guid_bag then

		local pos_bag = self.getPosition()
		if ((pos_bag.z < -26) and (pos_bag.z > -30)) or ((pos_bag.z < 30) and (pos_bag.z > 26))  then

			if ((pos_bag.x < -62.5) and (pos_bag.x > -67)) or ((pos_bag.x < 2) and (pos_bag.x > -2)) or ((pos_bag.x < 66.5) and (pos_bag.x > 62)) then

				self.shuffle()
				Wait.time(function () toDeployed() end, 0.5)

			end
		end
	end
end



function takeTheObject(position_of_the_object, guid_of_object)

	local params = {
		position = position_of_the_object,
		guid = guid_of_object
	}

	if rotate == false then
		params.rotation = {0, 180, 0}
	elseif rotate == true then
		params.rotation = {0, 0, 0}
	end

	self.takeObject(params)
end



function toMoveTile (pos, guid)

	local pos_tile = getObjectFromGUID(guid_bag).positionToWorld(pos)
	takeTheObject(pos_tile, guid)
	table.insert(fold_guid, guid)

end



function toCleanUpPions(x,guid)

	table.insert(all_pions[x], guid)
	table.insert(fold_guid, guid)

end



function toMovePions(nb_of_lines, first_pion, k, pos_y, pions, nb_of_rows, guid)

	for j = 1, (nb_of_lines*nb_of_rows) do

		takeTheObject((getObjectFromGUID(guid).positionToWorld({first_pion[1] + k*((j-1)%nb_of_rows), pos_y, -first_pion[2] - k*(((j-1)-(j-1)%nb_of_rows)/nb_of_rows)})), pions[j])

	end
end



function toDeployed()

	fold_guid = {}

	local obj_in_bag = self.getObjects()
	all_pions = {{},{},{},{}}
	central_board = ''
	warrior_board = ''

	local bag_pos = self.getPosition()

	if bag_pos.z > 28 and bag_pos.z < 29 then
		rotate = true
	else
		rotate = false
	end

  local n = #obj_in_bag
  if n ~= 0 then

    for k, value in pairs(obj_in_bag) do

  		if value.name == 'Plateau Joueur' then
  			toMoveTile({-0.5, 0.1, -12}, value.guid)
  			central_board = value.guid

      elseif value.name == 'Réserve de Guerriers' then
        toMoveTile({-8, 0.1, -5}, value.guid)
        warrior_board = value.guid

      elseif value.name == 'PV' then
        toMoveTile({0, 0.1, -2}, value.guid)

      elseif value.name == 'Fabrications persistantes' then
        toMoveTile({7.5, 0.1, -11}, value.guid)

      elseif value.guid == '515515' then
        toMoveTile({-0.1, 0.3, -14.7}, value.guid)

      elseif value.guid == '0735ea' then
        toMoveTile({0.75, 0.3, -14.7}, value.guid)

      elseif value.guid == '5e37ec' then
        toMoveTile({-0.1, 0.3, -16}, value.guid)

      elseif value.name == 'Toile' then
        toMoveTile({3, 0.1, -4}, value.guid)

      elseif value.name == 'Marqueur Mutation' then
        toMoveTile({5, 0.1, -4}, value.guid)

      elseif value.name == 'Dé' then
        toCleanUpPions(1, value.guid)

      elseif value.name == 'Guerrier' then
        toCleanUpPions(2, value.guid)

  		elseif value.name == 'Mise en place' then
        toCleanUpPions(3, value.guid)

      elseif value.name == 'Guerrier Adulte' then
        toCleanUpPions(4, value.guid)

  		end
  	end

    Wait.time(function () takeThePions(all_pions) end, 1.5)

  end
end




function takeThePions(table_pions)

	local pos_y = 2
	for i = 1,6 do

		local pions = table_pions[i]

		if i == 1 then  --Dé
			local k = 1
			local nb_of_lines = 1
			local first_pion = {3, 6}
			local nb_of_rows = 2

			toMovePions(nb_of_lines, first_pion, k, pos_y, pions, nb_of_rows, guid_bag)

		elseif i == 2 then --Guerrier
      local k = -0.6
			local nb_of_lines = 5
			local first_pion = {0.6, 1.2}
			local nb_of_rows = 3

			toMovePions(nb_of_lines, first_pion, k, pos_y, pions, nb_of_rows, warrior_board)

    elseif i == 3 then  --mise en place
      local k = 1
			local nb_of_lines = 1
			local first_pion = {-4, 2}
			local nb_of_rows = 1

			toMovePions(nb_of_lines, first_pion, k, pos_y, pions, nb_of_rows, guid_bag)


    elseif i == 4 then
      local k = -0.6
      local nb_of_lines = 5
      local first_pion = {1.2, 1.2}
      local nb_of_rows = 1

      toMovePions(nb_of_lines, first_pion, k, pos_y, pions, nb_of_rows, warrior_board)


		end
	end
end




function toFold()

	local n = #fold_guid


	if n ~= 0 then
		for i = 1,n do

			self.putObject(getObjectFromGUID(fold_guid[i]))
		end
	end

	fold_guid = {}
end

        centerButtonText = "[ Set left align ]"

    end
    self.createButton({

        tooltip=centerButtonText,
        click_function="swap_align",

        rotation={180,180,0},
        height=250,
        width=800,
        scale={x=1, y=1, z=1},

        })

    if tooltip_show then
        tooltipShowText = "[ Hide description in tooltip ]"
    else

    end
    self.createButton({
        label=tooltipShowText,
        tooltip=tooltipShowText,
        click_function="swap_tooltip",
        function_owner=self,
        position={0,-0.05,0.5},
        rotation={180,180,0},
        height=250,
        width=800,
        scale={x=1, y=1, z=1},

        value = "Sample Text",

        input_function = "keepSample", 
        function_owner = self, 
        alignment = f_align,
        position={0,-0.05,1.1},
        rotation={180,180,0},
        width = 1800, 
        height = 250, 
        font_size = 120, 
        scale={x=1, y=1, z=1},
        font_color=f_color,
        color = {0,0,0,0}
        })

    setTooltips()
end

function removeAll()
    self.removeInput(0)
    self.removeInput(1)
    self.removeInput(2)
    self.removeButton(0)
    self.removeButton(1)
    self.removeButton(2)
    self.removeButton(3)
end

function reloadAll()
    removeAll()
    createAll()
    setTooltips()
    updateSave()
end

function update_fcolor()
end

function swap_fcolor(_obj, _color, alt_click)
    light_mode = not light_mode
    reloadAll()
end

function swap_align(_obj, _color, alt_click)
    center_mode = not center_mode
    reloadAll()
end

function swap_tooltip(_obj, _color, alt_click)
    tooltip_show = not tooltip_show
    reloadAll()
    setTooltips()
end

function editName(_obj, _string, value) 
    self.setName(value)
    setTooltips()
end

function editDesc(_obj, _string, value) 
    self.setDescription(value)
    setTooltips()
end

function setTooltips()
    title = self.getName()
    if title == "" then
        title = "Notecard"
    end
    desc = self.getDescription()

    if tooltip_show then
        ttText = title .. "\n----------\n" .. desc
    else
        ttText = ""
    end

    self.editInput({
        index = 0,
        value = self.getName(),
        tooltip = ttText
        })
    self.editInput({
        index = 1,
        value = self.getDescription(),
        tooltip = ttText
        })
end

function null()
end

function keepSample(_obj, _string, value) 
    reloadAll()
end

ContainedObjects.Name: Custom_Token
ContainedObjects.Description:
Clique Gauche pour réduire l'Incubation.
Clique Droit pour augmenter l'Incubation.
ContainedObjects.LuaScript:
MIN_VALUE = 0
MAX_VALUE = 3

f_size = 260

function updateSave()
    local data_to_save = {value}
    saved_data = JSON.encode(data_to_save)
    self.script_state = saved_data
end

function onload(saved_data)
    if saved_data ~= "" then
        local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
        --Set up information off of loaded_data
        value = loaded_data[1]
    else
        --Set up information for if there is no saved saved data
        value = MIN_VALUE
    end

    createBtns()
end


--Beginning Setup


--Make setup button
function createBtns()

	local pos = {0,0.05,0.05}
	local rot = {0,0,0}
	local h = 400
	local w = 400
	local f_color = {0,0,0,255}
	local bg_color = {0,0,0,0}
	local diff = 0.8
	
	--center display
	self.createButton({
  label=tostring(value),
  click_function="add_subtract",
  function_owner=self,
  position=pos,
  rotation=rot,
  height=h,
  width=w,
  scale={x=3, y=3, z=3},
  font_size=get_size(value),
  color=f_size,
  font_color=f_color,
  color=bg_color
})	
end

function get_size(value)
  local char_count = string.len(tostring(value))
  return f_size * 2 / (char_count + 1)
end

function add_subtract(_obj, _color, alt_click)
  mod = alt_click and -1 or 1
  new_value = math.min(math.max(value + mod, MIN_VALUE), MAX_VALUE)
  if value ~= new_value then
    value = new_value
    updateDisplay()
    updateSave()
  end
end

function updateDisplay()
  	self.editButton({
    index = 0,
    label = tostring(value),
    font_size = get_size(value)
  })
end

ObjectStates.Name: Custom_Model_Bag
ObjectStates.LuaScript:
rotate = false


function onLoad()

	guid_bag = self.getGUID()

	params = {
        function_owner = self,
        rotation       = {10, 180, 0},
        width          = 500,
        height         = 200,
        font_size      = 100,
        color          = {0, 0, 0},
        font_color     = {1, 1, 1}
    }

    params.click_function = 'toFold'
    params.label = 'Ranger'
    params.position = {0, -0.22, -1}
	  self.createButton(params)

end



function onObjectDrop(_, dropped_object)

	if dropped_object.guid == guid_bag then

		local pos_bag = self.getPosition()
		if ((pos_bag.z < -26) and (pos_bag.z > -30)) or ((pos_bag.z < 30) and (pos_bag.z > 26))  then

			if ((pos_bag.x < -62.5) and (pos_bag.x > -67)) or ((pos_bag.x < 2) and (pos_bag.x > -2)) or ((pos_bag.x < 66.5) and (pos_bag.x > 62)) then

				self.shuffle()
				Wait.time(function () toDeployed() end, 0.5)

			end
		end
	end
end



function takeTheObject(position_of_the_object, guid_of_object)

	local params = {
		position = position_of_the_object,
		guid = guid_of_object
	}

	if rotate == false then
		params.rotation = {0, 180, 0}
	elseif rotate == true then
		params.rotation = {0, 0, 0}
	end

	self.takeObject(params)
end



function toMoveTile (pos, guid)

	local pos_tile = getObjectFromGUID(guid_bag).positionToWorld(pos)
	takeTheObject(pos_tile, guid)
	table.insert(fold_guid, guid)

end



function toCleanUpPions(x,guid)

	table.insert(all_pions[x], guid)
	table.insert(fold_guid, guid)

end



function toMovePions(nb_of_lines, first_pion, k, pos_y, pions, nb_of_rows, guid)

	for j = 1, (nb_of_lines*nb_of_rows) do

		takeTheObject((getObjectFromGUID(guid).positionToWorld({first_pion[1] + k*((j-1)%nb_of_rows), pos_y, -first_pion[2] - k*(((j-1)-(j-1)%nb_of_rows)/nb_of_rows)})), pions[j])

	end
end



function toDeployed()

	fold_guid = {}

	local obj_in_bag = self.getObjects()
	all_pions = {{},{},{}}
	central_board = ''
	warrior_board = ''

	local bag_pos = self.getPosition()

	if bag_pos.z > 28 and bag_pos.z < 29 then
		rotate = true
	else
		rotate = false
	end

  local n = #obj_in_bag
  if n ~= 0 then

    for k, value in pairs(obj_in_bag) do

  		if value.name == 'Plateau Joueur' then
  			toMoveTile({-0.5, 0.1, -8}, value.guid)
  			central_board = value.guid

      elseif value.name == 'PV' then
        toMoveTile({0, 0.1, -2}, value.guid)

      elseif value.name == 'Réserve de Guerriers' then
        toMoveTile({-6, 0.1, -7}, value.guid)
        warrior_board = value.guid

      elseif value.name == 'Fabrications persistantes' then
        toMoveTile({6, 0.1, -9.5}, value.guid)

      elseif value.name == 'Roue Macabre' then
        toMoveTile({0, 1, -8.1}, value.guid)

      elseif value.name == 'Cimetiere_RENARD' then
        toMoveTile({-0.720, 1, -10.340}, value.guid)
      elseif value.name == 'Cimetiere_LAPIN' then
        toMoveTile({-0.05, 1, -10.340}, value.guid)
      elseif value.name == 'Cimetiere_SOURIS' then
        toMoveTile({0.612, 1, -10.340}, value.guid)

      elseif value.name == 'Nécro Renard' then
        toMoveTile({1.445, 2, -9.65}, value.guid)
      elseif value.name == 'Marqueur Nécro Renard' then
        toMoveTile({1.445, 1, -9.65}, value.guid)

      elseif value.name == 'Nécro Lapin' then
        toMoveTile({1.445, 2, -10.342}, value.guid)
      elseif value.name == 'Marqueur Nécro Lapin' then
        toMoveTile({1.445, 1, -10.342}, value.guid)

      elseif value.name == 'Nécro Souris' then
        toMoveTile({1.445, 2, -10.955}, value.guid)
      elseif value.name == 'Marqueur Nécro Souris' then
        toMoveTile({1.445, 1, -10.955}, value.guid)

      elseif value.name == 'Dé' then
        toCleanUpPions(1, value.guid)

      elseif value.name == 'Guerrier' then
        toCleanUpPions(2, value.guid)

  		elseif value.name == 'Mise en place' then
        toCleanUpPions(3, value.guid)


  		end
  	end

    Wait.time(function () takeThePions(all_pions) end, 1.5)

  end
end




function takeThePions(table_pions)

	local pos_y = 2
	for i = 1,3 do

		local pions = table_pions[i]

		if i == 1 then  --Dé
			local k = 1
			local nb_of_lines = 1
			local first_pion = {-2, 1.5}
			local nb_of_rows = 2

			toMovePions(nb_of_lines, first_pion, k, pos_y, pions, nb_of_rows, guid_bag)

		elseif i == 2 then --Guerrier
      local k = -0.6
			local nb_of_lines = 3
			local first_pion = {1.2, 1.2}
			local nb_of_rows = 5

			toMovePions(nb_of_lines, first_pion, k, pos_y, pions, nb_of_rows, warrior_board)

    elseif i == 3 then  --mise en place
      local k = 1
			local nb_of_lines = 1
			local first_pion = {-4, 2}
			local nb_of_rows = 1

			toMovePions(nb_of_lines, first_pion, k, pos_y, pions, nb_of_rows, guid_bag)

		end
	end
end




function toFold()

	local n = #fold_guid

	if n ~= 0 then
		for i = 1,n do
			self.putObject(getObjectFromGUID(fold_guid[i]))
		end
	end

	fold_guid = {}
end

ContainedObjects.Name: Custom_Token
ContainedObjects.Description:
- Choisissez une clairière d'angle, et placez-y 3 guerriers, puis 1 Nécro et 1 Cimetière de la couleur correspondante.
- Piochez 3 cartes.
ContainedObjects.LuaScript:
function onload(saved_data)
    f_size = 260
    light_mode = false
    center_mode = false
    tooltip_show = true

    if saved_data ~= "" then
        local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
        light_mode = loaded_data[1]
        center_mode = loaded_data[2]
        tooltip_show = loaded_data[3]
    end

    createAll()
end

function updateSave()
    local data_to_save = {light_mode, center_mode, tooltip_show}
    saved_data = JSON.encode(data_to_save)
    self.script_state = saved_data
end

function createAll()
    s_color = {0.5, 0.5, 0.5, 95}

    if light_mode then
        f_color = {1,1,1,95}
    else
        f_color = {0,0,0,95}
    end

    if center_mode then
        f_align = 3
    else
        f_align = 1
    end

    if tooltip_show then
        ttText = self.getName() .. "\n----------\n" .. self.getDescription()
    else
        ttText = ""
    end

    self.createInput({
        value = self.getName(), 
        input_function = "editName", 
        label = "Notecard",
        function_owner = self, 
        alignment = 3,
        position = {0,0.05,-1}, 
        width = 1800, 
        height = 300, 
        font_size = 160, 
        scale={x=1, y=1, z=1},
        font_color= f_color,
        color = {0,0,0,0},
        tooltip = ttText
        })

    self.createInput({
        value = self.getDescription(), 
        label = "\nClick and type here\n\nFlip for settings",
        input_function = "editDesc", 
        function_owner = self, 
        alignment = f_align,
        position = {0,0.05,0.28}, 
        width = 1800, 
        height = 1000, 
        font_size = 120, 
        scale={x=1, y=1, z=1},
        font_color=f_color,
        color = {0,0,0,0},
        tooltip = ttText
        })

    self.createButton({
        label="- Notecard Settings -",
        tooltip="- Notecard Settings -",
        click_function="null",
        function_owner=self,
        position={0,-0.05,-1.1},
        rotation={180,180,0},
        height=300,
        width=800,
        scale={x=1, y=1, z=1},
        font_size=140,
        font_color=s_color,
        color={0,0,0,0}
        })

    if light_mode then
        lightButtonText = "[ Set dark text ]"
    else
        lightButtonText = "[ Set light text ]"
    end
    self.createButton({
        label=lightButtonText,
        tooltip=lightButtonText,
        click_function="swap_fcolor",
        function_owner=self,
        position={0,-0.05,-0.5},
        rotation={180,180,0},
        height=250,
        width=800,
        scale={x=1, y=1, z=1},
        font_size=100,
        font_color=s_color,
        color={0,0,0,0}
        })

    if center_mode then
        centerButtonText = "[ Set left align ]"
    else
        centerButtonText = "[ Set center align ]"
    end
    self.createButton({
        label=centerButtonText,
        tooltip=centerButtonText,
        click_function="swap_align",
        function_owner=self,
        position={0,-0.05,0},
        rotation={180,180,0},
        height=250,
        width=800,
        scale={x=1, y=1, z=1},
        font_size=100,
        font_color=s_color,
        color={0,0,0,0}
        })

    if tooltip_show then
        tooltipShowText = "[ Hide description in tooltip ]"
    else
        tooltipShowText = "[ Show description in tooltip ]"
    end
    self.createButton({
        label=tooltipShowText,
        tooltip=tooltipShowText,
        click_function="swap_tooltip",
        function_owner=self,
        position={0,-0.05,0.5},
        rotation={180,180,0},
        height=250,
        width=800,
        scale={x=1, y=1, z=1},
        font_size=100,
        font_color=s_color,
        color={0,0,0,0}
        })

    self.createInput({
        value = "Sample Text",
        label = "...",
        input_function = "keepSample", 
        function_owner = self, 
        alignment = f_align,
        position={0,-0.05,1.1},
        rotation={180,180,0},
        width = 1800, 
        height = 250, 
        font_size = 120, 
        scale={x=1, y=1, z=1},
        font_color=f_color,
        color = {0,0,0,0}
        })

    setTooltips()
end

function removeAll()
    self.removeInput(0)
    self.removeInput(1)
    self.removeInput(2)
    self.removeButton(0)
    self.removeButton(1)
    self.removeButton(2)
    self.removeButton(3)
end

function reloadAll()
    removeAll()
    createAll()
    setTooltips()
    updateSave()
end

function update_fcolor()
end

function swap_fcolor(_obj, _color, alt_click)
    light_mode = not light_mode
    reloadAll()
end

function swap_align(_obj, _color, alt_click)
    center_mode = not center_mode
    reloadAll()
end

    tooltip_show = not tooltip_show
    reloadAll()
    setTooltips()
end

function editName(_obj, _string, value) 
    self.setName(value)
    setTooltips()
end

    self.setDescription(value)
    setTooltips()
end

function setTooltips()
    title = self.getName()
    if title == "" then
        title = "Notecard"
    end
    desc = self.getDescription()

    if tooltip_show then
        ttText = title .. "\n----------\n" .. desc
    else
        ttText = ""
    end

    self.editInput({
        index = 0,
        value = self.getName(),
        tooltip = ttText
        })
    self.editInput({
        index = 1,
        value = self.getDescription(),
        tooltip = ttText
        })
end

function null()
end

function keepSample(_obj, _string, value) 
    reloadAll()
end
